channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Israel’s Qatar Strike on Hamas Suggests Arab Cooperation
item.description: Clues point to tacit support from Jordan and Saudi Arabia, despite their public protests.

item.title: Here are the main features you’re sacrificing if you buy Apple’s new ultra-thin iPhone Air
item.description: It's the boldest iPhone design in years. But it doesn't come without some compromises.

item.title: Trump’s Bold Strike Against the Venezuelan Narco-Communist Regime
item.description: By bombing drug traffickers and invoking the Alien Enemies Act, Trump honors the just war imperative to protect the U.S. from hemispheric perils.

item.title: Intel: (Jean-Baptiste) Colbert and Corleone
item.description: The week of September 1, 2025: Intel’s new role, gold, government statistics, the Fed, and much, much more.

item.title: For Children, Surrogacy Always Creates A Deep, Gaping Hole Where A Mother Should Be
item.description: Like a sapling wounded early, my life bent and grew around the gaping wound of abandonment. It became a part of me.

item.title: GOP senator compares Israel's Hamas fight to US killing of Usama bin Laden
item.description: Sen. Steve Daines, R-Mont., heads to Israel after its unprecedented strike in Qatar that targeted Hamas leaders.

item.title: Evidence Shows Women Are At Least As Likely To Abuse Partners As Men
item.description: 'The last taboo' is the idea that women initiate or engage in domestic violence as much as, or in some cases even more, than men do.

item.title: Russia’s Drone Incursion over Poland Demands a Serious Response
item.description: If Russia thinks NATO is a paper tiger, Moscow must be forced to reconsider.

item.title: Las Vegas mayor says the city is suffering from a serious drop in Canadian tourists: ‘We need you, and we miss you’
item.description: Shelley Berkley echoed worries from last month when she said traffic from Canada and Mexico has "gone from a faucet to a drip."

item.title: Each Word Of This NYT Agitprop On The Charlotte Murder Is Worse Than The Last
item.description: The entire article is an exercise in lazy propaganda slop, and they don't care if you notice. Just don't go around noticing any more crimes.
